title: Red Riding armor
summaries: The Red Riding armor is a ranger-oriented armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 2250000*225 [img:Defender Medal] in total, after Golem has been defeated. The set consists of the Red Riding Hood, Red Riding Dress and Red Riding Leggings.
A full set of Red Riding armor will provide the following benefits:

• +48 defense
  • +25% ranged damage
  • +60% minion damage
  • +20% / +10% ranged critical strike chance
  • +20% ammo conservation
  • +20% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will greatly increase the fire rate of Explosive Trap sentries and will cause their attacks to inflict the Oiled debuff, making enemies take increased damage from On Fire!, Hellfire, Cursed Inferno, Frostburn, and Shadowflame.
The Red Riding armor set is a direct upgrade of the Huntress armor set.
